metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of Daman Superstation, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：大满超级站气象要素梯度观测系统（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of Daman Superstation from January 1 to December 31, 2022. The site (100.372° E, 38.856° N) was located on a cropland (maize surface) in the Daman irrigation, which is near Zhangye city, Gansu Province. The elevation is 1556 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (AV-14TH;3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, and 40 m, towards north), wind speed and direction profile (windsonic; 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, and 40 m, towards north), air pressure (CS100; 2 m), rain gauge (TE525M; 2.5 m, 8 m in west of tower), four-component radiometer (PIR&PSP; 12 m, towards south), two infrared temperature sensors (IRTC3; 12 m, towards south, vertically downward), photosynthetically active radiation (LI190SB; 12 m, towards south, vertically upward; another four photosynthetically active radiation, PQS-1; two above the plants (12 m) and two below the plants (0.3 m), towards south, each with one vertically downward and one vertically upward), soil heat flux (HFP01SC; 3 duplicates with G1 below the vegetation; G2 and G3 between plants, -0.06 m), a TCAV averaging soil thermocouple probe (TCAV; -0.02, -0.04 m), soil temperature profile (AV-10T; 0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, and -1.6 m), soil moisture profile (CS616; -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, and -1.6 m).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_3 m, Ta_5 m, Ta_10 m, Ta_15 m, Ta_20 m, Ta_30 m, and Ta_40 m; RH_3 m, RH_5 m, RH_10 m, RH_15 m, RH_20 m, RH_30 m, and RH_40 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_3 m, Ws_5 m, Ws_10 m, Ws_15 m, Ws_20 m, Ws_30 m, and Ws_40 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_3 m, WD_5 m, WD_10 m, WD_15 m, WD_20 m, WD_30m, and WD_40 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), photosynthetically active radiation (PAR) (μmol/ (s m-2)), average soil temperature (TCAV, ℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, below the vegetation; Gs_2, and Gs_3, between plants) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_80 cm, Ts_120 cm, and Ts_160 cm) (℃), soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm, Ms_10 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_80 cm, Ms_120 cm, and Ms_160 cm) (%, volumetric water content), above the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_U_up and PAR_U_down) (μmol/ (s m-2)), and below the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_D_up and PAR_D_down) (μmol/ (s m-2)).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2022-6-10 10:30. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游大满超级站气象要素梯度观测系统数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区农田内，下垫面是玉米田。观测点的经纬度是100.3722E, 38.8555N，海拔1556m。风速/风向、空气温度、相对湿度传感器分别架设在3m、5m、10m、15m、20m、30m、40m处，共7层，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在塔西侧约8m处，架高2.5m；四分量辐射仪安装在12m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在12m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤热流板（自校正式）（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处，朝向正南距离塔体2m处，其中两块（Gs_2、Gs_3）埋设在棵间，一块（Gs_1）埋设在植株下面；平均土壤温度传感器TCAV埋设在地下2cm、4cm处，朝向正南，距离塔体2m处；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；光合有效辐射仪安装在12m处，探头朝向是垂直向上；另有四个光合有效辐射仪分别架设在冠层上方和冠层内，冠层上方安装在12m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）、冠层内安装在0.3m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）高处，朝向正南。
观测项目有：风速（WS_3m、WS_5m、WS_10m、WS_15m、WS_20m、WS_30m、WS_40m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_3m、WD_5m、WD_10m、WD_15m、WD_20m、WD_30m、WD_40m）(单位：度)、空气温湿度（Ta_3m、Ta_5m、Ta_10m、Ta_15m、Ta_20m、Ta_30m、Ta_40m和RH_3m、RH_5m、RH_10m、RH_15m、RH_20m、RH_30m、RH_40m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、平均土壤温度（TCAV）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm）(单位：百分比)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm）(单位：摄氏度) 、光合有效辐射（PAR）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)、冠层上向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_U_up、PAR_U_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)和冠层下向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_D_up、PAR_D_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2022-6-10 10:30。
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被前期研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行观测，同时还包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the data processing and quality control procedure for hydrometeorological datasets in oasis–desert areas mainly focused on data collection, data processing, or data archiving and sharing?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区，水文气象数据集的数据处理和质量控制程序主要集中在数据收集、数据处理还是数据归档和共享上？

Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统，闪烁仪，自动气象站

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the observational datasets from oasis–desert systems, such as energy and carbon fluxes, typically collected?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 沙漠-绿洲系统的观测数据集，例如能量和碳通量，通常在哪里收集？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced in maintaining ecological balance in arid inland river basins?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域维持生态平衡面临哪些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to gather energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to gather energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems is the use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, supplemented by automatic weather stations that observe a range of hydrometeorological data with a 10-minute average period.
Example.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，用于收集能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的一种数据收集方法是使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，辅以自动气象站观察一系列水文气象数据，平均周期为10分钟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when conducting ecological observations in arid and semi-arid inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域进行生态观察时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge faced in conducting ecological observations in arid and semi-arid inland river basins is the ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent occurrence of dust storms.
Example.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域进行生态观察时面临的一个挑战是生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁发生的沙尘暴。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that includes long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含绿洲-沙漠地区长期能量、水汽和碳交换观测的示例数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset that includes long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas is the one reported in the study area of the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, which comprises energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, hydrometeorological data, and vegetation and soil parameters, freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个包含绿洲-沙漠地区长期能量、水汽和碳交换观测的数据集的例子是中下游HRB研究区的研究，该数据集包括能量、水汽和碳通量、气象水文数据以及植被和土壤参数，数据可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main characteristics of the meteorological elements observed in the Heihe River Basin?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 黑河流域观测到的气象要素的主要特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: wind speed and direction at seven different heights, air temperature and relative humidity at seven different heights, air pressure, precipitation, four-component radiation, surface radiation temperature, average soil temperature, soil heat flux, soil moisture, soil temperature at various depths, photosynthetically active radiation both above and within the canopy
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 七个不同高度的风速和风向、七个不同高度的空气温度和相对湿度、气压、降水、四分量辐射、地表辐射温度、平均土壤温度、土壤热通量、土壤湿度、不同深度的土壤温度、冠层上方和内部的光合有效辐射。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key challenges faced in maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡时面临的主要挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: ecological environment degradation, drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, frequent dust storms
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 生态环境退化，河流和湖泊干涸，自然植被退化，土地荒漠化加剧，沙尘暴频发。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in the arid regions of western China since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，在中国西部的干旱地区建立了多少个地表通量和气象站？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the number of layers at which wind speed and direction sensors are placed in the meteorological observation system?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 气象观测系统中风速和风向传感器设置的层数是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is an 'eddy covariance system' in the context of data collection for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，'涡度协方差系统'是用于收集能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的一种系统。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a method used to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, which is crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems. It is part of the suite of observational datasets used in studies of these areas.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种获取半小时湍流通量数据的方法，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换至关重要。它是用于研究这些区域的观测数据集的一部分。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying principles can be inferred from the data collection techniques used in observing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从观察绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集技术中，可以推断出哪些基本原则？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The data collection techniques, which include the use of eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period, suggest a focus on capturing precise, continuous measurements that can track small-scale changes in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange. These methods highlight the importance of high temporal resolution and the integration of various environmental parameters to understand the dynamics of oasis-desert ecosystems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据收集技术，包括使用涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和具有10分钟平均周期的自动气象站，表明关注捕捉精确、连续的测量，以跟踪能量、水蒸气和碳交换的小规模变化。这些方法强调了高时间分辨率的重要性以及整合各种环境参数以理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统动态的必要性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it crucial to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems in the context of data collection for sustainable development?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在可持续发展数据收集的背景下，维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡至关重要。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Maintaining the balance is vital to achieve sustainable oasis development, as it supports ecological security and the socioeconomic stability of arid regions. Understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange through long-term observations helps to protect these delicate ecosystems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 维持平衡对于实现可持续的绿洲发展至关重要，因为它支持干旱地区的生态安全和社会经济稳定。通过长期观察了解能量、水汽和碳的交换，有助于保护这些脆弱的生态系统。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of employing a multi-layered sensor approach for collecting meteorological and soil data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中采用多层传感器方法收集气象和土壤数据的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing a multi-layered sensor approach allows for a comprehensive understanding of the vertical gradients of atmospheric and soil parameters, which can lead to insights into the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes in oasis–desert ecosystems, thereby supporting sustainable development and ecological stability.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用多层传感器方法可以全面了解大气和土壤参数的垂直梯度，这有助于深入了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换过程，从而支持可持续发展和生态稳定。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the integration of long-term observational datasets influence the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集的整合如何影响对干旱地区能量、水汽和碳交换的理解？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The integration of long-term observational datasets enhances the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange by providing continuous and consistent data over time, which is critical for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and contributes to achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals in these regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集的整合增强了对能量、水汽和碳交换的理解，因为它提供了持续和一致的时间数据，这对于识别绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并有助于实现这些地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind establishing a comprehensive observation network for surface processes in arid and semi-arid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 建立干旱和半干旱地区表面过程综合观测网络的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, which is crucial for achieving the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality, supporting ecological security, and ensuring sustainable development in these regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，这对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标、支持生态安全以及确保这些地区的可持续发展至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中维护长期观测数据集的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are indispensable for quantitatively understanding the interactions in oasis–desert ecosystems, which are significant for protecting ecological stability and supporting socioeconomic development in oases.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 长期观察对于定量理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的相互作用至关重要，这对保护生态稳定性和支持绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the rationale for using a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观察数据集的理由是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The rationale is to provide comprehensive data involving energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes along with auxiliary hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters, which help in recognizing oasis–desert interactions and support sustainable development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该 rationale 的目的是提供全面的数据，包括能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量，以及辅助的水文气象、植被和土壤参数，这有助于识别绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用，并支持可持续发展。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key procedures for setting up a meteorological gradient observation system within an agricultural area to monitor various climatic factors?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在农业区域内设置气象梯度观测系统以监测各种气候因素的关键程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The key procedures include installing sensors for wind speed and direction at multiple heights (3m to 40m), placing a barometer at 2m, a rain gauge at 2.5m height, and positioning radiation instruments at 12m. Soil temperature and moisture sensors are embedded at various depths, and different orientations and distances from the tower are considered for precise measurements.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 关键程序包括在多个高度（3米到40米）安装风速和风向传感器，在2米处放置气压计，在2.5米高度放置雨量计，以及在12米处定位辐射仪器。土壤温度和湿度传感器嵌入在不同深度，并考虑了与塔的不同方向和距离以获得精确的测量。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can data quality control be effectively implemented in a long-term meteorological observation network to ensure accuracy and reliability?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何在长期气象观测网络中有效实施数据质量控制，以确保准确性和可靠性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data quality control can be implemented by ensuring a consistent number of daily data points (e.g., 144 for every 10-minute interval), marking missing data with specific values, removing duplicate records, deleting data beyond physical or instrumental limits, and highlighting questionable data in red. Consistent formatting for date and time is also crucial.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制可以通过确保每天有一致数量的数据点（例如，每10分钟144个数据点）来实施，使用特定值标记缺失数据，删除重复记录，删除超出物理或仪器限制的数据，并将可疑数据用红色突出显示。一致的日期和时间格式也至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological steps are involved in collecting and processing hydrometeorological and soil parameter data in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集和处理水文气象和土壤参数数据的方法步骤包括哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The methodological steps involve acquiring data through instruments like eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for fluxes, and automatic weather stations for meteorological variables. Data processing includes collecting, processing, archiving, and sharing the data, with specific emphasis on capturing gradients of air temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, and maintaining a regular data collection schedule.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 方法步骤包括通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取通量数据，以及通过自动气象站获取气象变量。数据处理包括收集、处理、存档和共享数据，特别强调捕捉空气温度、湿度、风速和风向的梯度，并保持定期的数据收集计划。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do automated weather stations facilitate the collection of comprehensive hydrometeorological data in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 自动气象站如何促进在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中全面水文气象数据的收集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Automated weather stations facilitate the collection of comprehensive hydrometeorological data by integrating various sensors that measure radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature, air temperature, humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture with a 10-minute average period.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 自动气象站通过集成多种传感器，收集全面的水文气象数据，这些传感器测量辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度、空气温度、湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量以及土壤湿度，数据以10分钟的平均周期进行记录。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for establishing long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区建立长期观测数据集所需的条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Establishing long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid regions requires conditions such as the deployment of land surface flux and meteorological stations to continuously monitor energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, alongside the support of robust data processing and quality control procedures.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区建立长期观测数据集需要满足一些条件，例如部署地表通量和气象站，以持续监测能量、水蒸气和碳的交换，同时支持强有力的数据处理和质量控制程序。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What reasons might contribute to the expectation that oasis–desert areas require specific data collection methods for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 哪些原因可能导致人们期望绿洲-沙漠地区在能源、水蒸气和碳交换研究中需要特定的数据收集方法？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Oasis–desert areas have unique ecological dynamics, with oases supporting a significant portion of the population in arid regions and playing a crucial role in ecological stability. The complex interactions between energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges necessitate specialized data collection methods, such as using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for capturing turbulent flux data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 绿洲——沙漠地区具有独特的生态动态，绿洲在干旱地区支持着相当一部分人口，并在生态稳定性中发挥着关键作用。能量、水汽和碳交换之间的复杂相互作用需要专门的数据收集方法，例如使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪来捕捉湍流通量数据。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using multiple layers of sensors at different heights for collecting meteorological data in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在干旱地区使用不同高度的多层传感器收集气象数据的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using multiple layers of sensors at different heights is effective for capturing vertical profiles of meteorological parameters such as wind speed, air temperature, and humidity, which are crucial in understanding energy exchange processes in arid regions. This approach enables detailed analysis of atmospheric conditions, providing valuable insights into microclimatic variations and enhancing the precision of data collected.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用不同高度的多层传感器有效地捕捉气象参数的垂直剖面，如风速、空气温度和湿度，这对于理解干旱地区的能量交换过程至关重要。这种方法能够对大气条件进行详细分析，提供对微气候变化的宝贵见解，并提高所收集数据的精确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of the challenges involved in maintaining long-term observation networks in oasis–desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在绿洲-沙漠系统中维持长期观测网络所面临的挑战的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Maintaining long-term observation networks in oasis–desert systems is challenging due to harsh environmental conditions, including extreme temperatures and dust storms, which can affect equipment reliability. Additionally, logistical challenges related to site accessibility and the need for consistent data quality control and archiving over extended periods add complexity to such endeavors.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中维持长期观测网络面临挑战，主要由于恶劣的环境条件，包括极端温度和沙尘暴，这些都会影响设备的可靠性。此外，现场可达性相关的后勤挑战以及在较长时间内保持一致的数据质量控制和归档的需求，进一步增加了此类工作的复杂性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how do you perceive the potential benefits of integrating hydrometeorological and soil data in understanding oasis–desert interactions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，整合水文气象和土壤数据在理解绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用方面具有潜在的好处。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating hydrometeorological and soil data is highly beneficial for understanding oasis–desert interactions as it provides comprehensive insights into energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes. This integration helps in assessing the ecological and agricultural stability of these systems, supporting sustainable development and ecological security goals.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合水文气象和土壤数据对于理解绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用具有重要意义，因为它提供了对能量、水汽和碳交换过程的全面洞察。这种整合有助于评估这些系统的生态和农业稳定性，支持可持续发展和生态安全目标。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection methods can effectively capture energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集方法如何有效捕捉绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Observational datasets from oasis–desert systems include long-term measurements of energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes. These are acquired using an eddy covariance system and scintillometer, supplemented by hydrometeorological data observed from automatic weather stations, which provide information on radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature and humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量的长期测量。这些数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的，并辅以自动气象站观察的水文气象数据，这些数据提供了辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面的信息。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I am unsure about the challenges faced when collecting data in arid and semiarid inland river basins.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域收集数据时面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: These regions face ecological environment degradation, such as drying rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These challenges complicate data collection efforts.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 这些地区面临生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些挑战使数据收集工作变得更加复杂。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how datasets are managed and shared in large-scale environmental observations.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解大型环境观测中数据集是如何管理和共享的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data management involves data collection, processing, and archiving for sharing. For oasis–desert areas, datasets of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations are made freely available from platforms like the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center, ensuring accessibility for further research.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据管理涉及数据的收集、处理和归档，以便共享。对于绿洲-沙漠地区，能量、水汽和碳交换观测的数据集通过国家西藏高原数据中心等平台免费提供，确保了进一步研究的可获取性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline a comprehensive data collection strategy for observing meteorological and hydrometeorological parameters in arid and semi-arid regions, incorporating both natural and artificial systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 制定一个全面的数据收集策略，以观察干旱和半干旱地区的气象和水文气象参数，结合自然和人工系统。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A comprehensive data collection strategy would involve setting up multiple observation points with automatic weather stations to record data such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles. Additionally, using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers could provide detailed measurements of energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes. These systems should collect data at regular intervals, such as every 10 minutes or half-hourly, to ensure a robust dataset. Supplementary data on vegetation and soil parameters should also be collected to provide context and enhance the understanding of the observed interactions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一个全面的数据收集策略将涉及设置多个观测点，配备自动气象站以记录数据，如辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量以及土壤湿度剖面。此外，使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪可以提供能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量的详细测量。这些系统应以定期的时间间隔收集数据，例如每10分钟或每半小时，以确保数据集的稳健性。还应收集关于植被和土壤参数的补充数据，以提供背景并增强对观察到的相互作用的理解。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please propose a method for expanding existing datasets on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions to include additional parameters that could enhance understanding of these ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提出一种方法，以扩展现有的关于干旱地区能源、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集，包含额外的参数，以增强对这些生态系统的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: To expand existing datasets, additional parameters such as detailed soil nutrient profiles, microbial activity, and more granular vegetation data (e.g., species diversity, phenology) could be included. Employing remote sensing technologies like aerial drones equipped with multispectral sensors could provide high-resolution spatial data on vegetation and surface temperature. Integrating these new data sources with existing datasets can offer a more comprehensive view of the ecosystem processes. Collaborative efforts with local research institutions could also facilitate the inclusion of socio-economic data, linking ecological observations with human impact assessments.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 为了扩展现有的数据集，可以加入额外的参数，例如详细的土壤营养成分、微生物活性以及更细致的植被数据（如物种多样性、物候）。利用配备多光谱传感器的无人机等遥感技术，可以提供关于植被和地表温度的高分辨率空间数据。将这些新数据源与现有数据集整合，可以提供对生态系统过程的更全面视角。与当地研究机构的合作努力也可以促进社会经济数据的纳入，将生态观察与人类影响评估联系起来。
